snippet: Daniel Curry, who was seriously injured during a performance of “Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark,” has filed a lawsuit charging the producers with negligence.
abstract: Daniel Curry, actor who was seriously injured during August 2013 performance of Broadway musical Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark, files lawsuit charging the producers with negligence in design and operation of a mechanical lift he was using onstage when he was hurt.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Curry, who was seriously injured during a performance of “Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark,” has filed a lawsuit charging the producers with negligence.
